articles.description: Reaction to England's 2-0 win over Finland at Wembley as captain Kane scores twice on his 100th cap, plus Pochettino named US manager
articles.title: Reaction to England 2-0 Finland; Harry Kane scores twice and wins 100th cap

articles.description: BBC Sport explores the history of long-range goals in the Premier League and how data and tactics are shaping how often they're scored.
articles.title: Long range goals: Is shooting from outside the box a dying art in football?

articles.description: Captain Suzann Pettersen says she will keep her assertive captaincy style as she attempts to steer Europe to Solheim Cup victory over the USA in Virginia.
articles.title: Solheim Cup 2024: Europe must maintain momentum against USA - Suzann Pettersen

articles.description: Brazil and Argentina are both defeated in their latest qualifying matches for the 2026 Fifa World Cup.
articles.title: 2026 World Cup: Brazil and Argentina lose latest qualifying matches

articles.description: England host Ireland in the third women’s one-day international at Civil Service Cricket Club, Belfast. – follow text updates and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs Ireland LIVE: third women’s ODI – cricket score, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: US Open semi-finalist Jack Draper is left out of Great Britain's opening tie against Finland at the Davis Cup Finals group stage on Wednesday.
articles.title: Davis Cup: GB leave Jack Draper out of Finland group tie

articles.description: England interim manager Lee Carsley strengthened his claims to be Gareth Southgate's permanent successor after a second straight win.
articles.title: England 2-0 Finland: Three Lions job looks like Lee Carsley's to lose

articles.description: Australia hockey player Tom Craig is banned for 12 months after being arrested on suspicion of buying cocaine during the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Tom Craig: Australia hockey player gets 12-month ban after cocaine arrest

articles.description: Former Tottenham and Chelsea boss Mauricio Pochettino is named as the new manager of the United States men's team.
articles.title: Mauricio Pochettino named new US men's team manager

articles.description:
With the football season in full swing, BBC Sport looks at the out-of-work bosses 
available when the managerial merry-go-round kicks in.
articles.title: Lampard, Potter, Tuchel, Zidane: Out-of-work bosses raring for next job
